column5: It's never the initial moment you fart, it's the next time you bend over or crouch etc where the push of air hits you in the face! Lol. Usually once you've already forgotten about the fart haha.
one piece floater suits are worst  not that my .... .....
anything that directs air upwards.....is most certainly a bad thing
I've ripped off my snowmobile helmet before....
As you are in line for a Timmies  not a good thing!
I think it's the combination of farts and sweating all day, then finally taking them off that's almost keeled me over at the truck before, lol!
A night of icefishing is also a killer!
It's why I have the warmest shack on the ice LOL

If it's only gas that is expelled from the intestines that's not bad at all. Think twice before letting one rip in those rubber chastity suits, it might be a wet one, then you have a real problem my friends, a real messy problem. Gives a entire different meaning to float fishing.

If it's only gas that is expelled from the intestines that's not bad at all. Think twice before letting one rip in those rubber chastity suits, it might be a wet one, then you have a real problem my friends, a real messy problem. Gives a entire different meaning to float fishing.  lol  i have had to drive home with no pants before. what i thought was a fart, wasn't a fart...
Oh my... HH
lol  i have had to drive home with no pants before. what i thought was a fart, wasn't a fart...  LOL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!   The important question is though....How long did you fish after the 'mistake'????
he went looking for the 'bear' in the woods and couldn't find him and left!
LOL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!   The important question is though....How long did you fish after the 'mistake'????  lol i went home was the end of 13 hours of fishing
lol  i have had to drive home with no pants before. what i thought was a fart, wasn't a fart... We call that a shart !!  .I think we have all been there .
No pants, on the 407. Listen Constable, Sir, I mean Mame no Miss oh geesh, I really was fishing.
LOL was hoping not to get pulled over.  Want to step out of the vehical sir, ummmmm no, i really don't
Funny stuff, thanks, I need it.
do it in ac rowd then stare at someone else. any one got a lighter???
just don't put on the waders after a turkey diner.........
